title: Course Allotment Simulation using SAT Solver
description: As part of Bachelors project, worked on solving the real world problem of finding a best course allocation under various constraints as a SAT (Satisfiability) problem and infer effects of different policies on course allotment and choices. Studied relative efficiency of various heuristics modeled on different solvers like MiniSAT and Glucose.

title: IIT Bombay Hospital Digitization
description: Created a complete web application in Java that could handle operations on relational MySQL databases to handle various processes of the university hospital.

title: Simple 2D Physics Engine
description: Wrote a physics engine for simple round bodies providing a back-end that could generate coordinates in real-time with collision, gravity, restitution and custom resolution of time.

title: Social Sea
description: Create a lightweight social search engine that shows the results ranked (using page-ranking) according to one's peer-group search history and rating.
